reviews.review:
Résumé:
- Tueur cancer
- Survivant cancer
- Développeur ne pensant qu'à l'argent: préfère sortir de nouveaux dlc que de payer des serveurs ou régler les bugs
这是我入steam后第一个毫不犹豫买的游戏 [strike]然后它就打折了QAQ[/strike] 挺爱玩的一个恐怖游戏 [strike]【这TM明显是个农场主抓偷电贼的故事好嘛（╯‵□′）╯︵┴─┴】[/strike] 但是不得不吐槽一下猎空的体验 在直播平台上还没禁播前特别喜欢看这个消磨时间 特别是戴上耳机听bgm的感觉【有个原声带dlc考虑可以入手】 不得不说还是蛮喜欢的嘛

Игра хорошо подойдет для тех кто после работы или учебы может позволить себе сыграть пару каток и насладится тем азартом который передает эта игра. В нее не стоит задротить, а уж тем более агрится на неопытных игроков своей команды. Очень радует что из доната в игре только маньяки и выжившие, конечно хорошо прокаченный маньяк вынесет тебя на 100 процентов, но разработчики постоянно трудятся над балансом и до сих пор ее не забросили
P.S не агритесь если с вами не захотили пофармить. Фарм - ЗАПРЕЩЕН
рекомендую классная игра
Dbd is a very nice game with updates coming all the time. I recommend it to everyone :D
I like it

Хорошая динамичная игра, разработанная на open source движке U4. Есть баги и недочёты, но главный минус - ценовая политика относительно DLC. Одному играть можно только для фарма очков. 

При корректировке цен на DLC и добавления более разнообразных сценариев для карт будет иметь вторую жизнь.

Итог: покупать без DLC, чтобы поиграть с друзьями или на распрадаже. Наскучит за 100-150 часов точно.
이번패치로 살인마 살만해짐

After almost 3k hours in this game, I have to say I love it! There is no other game currently out there that has held my attention for so long. With each update the game gets better and better. For a small team, they've come so far, with a new major update every month and a half keeping the game fresh! I recommend this to anyone looking for a new experience, like they have never had before!
สนุกมากเเต่เกมเเลคควรทําให้เกมไม่เเลคคับ
Симулятор бега от дядьки с ножом. "Дядь не стукай ,заебал".

The game itself is very fun and you can lose hours of your life playing it as either Killer or Survivor. The Bloodweb system is fun and really offers replayability to get new Perks and items, etc. 

However there are some game breaking glitches that the creators have not fixed since the start. There are trees that will eat you. Yes. Not literally but if you go to them, you have a good chance of getting stuck on their edge or inside them. You can't get out and the only way to free yourself is to get downed by the Killer and picked up. Sometimes that doesn't even work. Same thing with some Hooks in the game that the Survivors get on. Rocks as well can be glitched including random invisible areas on Maps which could ruin your game.

The Struggle system is still terrible, since most hooks are very close to eachother on certain maps and Killers can most of the time very easily get to one. 

The Developers are ego filled and don't listen to the community at all. While a majority of the community are the same and toxic to the core. You will have people threatening you left and right that won't get a sniff from the mod's noses.You will have people do really awful methods to make sure they win a game or to just screw other players over such as purposely revealing their team to the Killer, working with the Killer, etc. Don't feel bad, there are some wonderful and awesome players in the game on both sides of the Kill/Survive coin. However if things keep going how they are, these shining players will drown in negativity. 

For only 20 dollars, this game IS a snatch deal. You WILL have fun just be cautious of who you play with and who are on the Forums. Your fun could easily derail and sour your outlook for the game itself.

Good luck in the Fog!
Epic game.

在玩这个游戏或者细看我这篇评论之前，我想有时候我们应该正视什么是正确的游戏体验。如何最大化得到游戏的乐趣才是我们接触游戏的初衷，不是么，所以你觉得观点不同可以详细讨论，别无脑否定。
我看到有一篇评价是关于这个游戏与lol的对比，于是突然放弃了回复这个评论而想了些新的东西，首先我说lol是相对公平的，我也谨慎的用了相对而言，因为我再也找不到一个公司为了平衡一个游戏而做出如此多的补丁，可能是因为这个游戏运营的好么，或者说开发的相当成功，亦或利益驱使，但是从原画的更新到具体数值的更改，lol可以说是对于具体游戏数据的把握到了一定程度，但是你说绝对平衡么？并不是，他们只是把每位英雄的胜率以50%的胜率拉一条线，尽量保持每位英雄的胜率都在这一条线，太低，直接重做，诸如寒冰，加里奥等等，太高开始削弱，我想对于一个游戏本身而言，已经够了，他们已经尽全力做到了最好。我相信就算你什么都不用管，你是这个项目的负责人，给你这么多英雄，你怎么让他们都平衡呢？刀妹胜率高于50%很多，你是否削弱，瑞文同样很厉害，你又是否削弱，不削弱场场这个英雄，你愿意看到么？削弱专玩这些英雄的人不满，你又能怎样呢。换位思考，仔细想想，谁也做不到绝对平衡。
说的有点远了，回到黎明杀机这个游戏上，我们不能拿这个游戏的平衡性说什么，因为这并不是竞技对抗类游戏，你能做的，也仅仅是拿手电去反抗，所以，我们在讨论官方对于游戏定义出现偏差的时候，有什么意义呢？我想官方认为正确的游戏玩法，肯定会有人死亡，有人逃脱，屠夫也是要分的，人类也是要分的，我想如果这个游戏改为竞技类游戏，那么1v4，也并不见得这样做，人类虽强，有什么意义呢，倒是我感觉人类强的时候，修发电机，溜屠夫，更像是一个单机游戏，如此而言，不如把屠夫改成AI，不是更符合很多人的心理么？
当然，这个游戏还是有相当多的bug和改善的地方，数据说明了一切，玩家数量的下降也很说明这个问题，游戏的开发潜力巨大，需要完善的地方很多，但是我想它把握了一个游戏的核心，那么还是有很多人喜欢的，我想多数人的游戏体验比较糟糕可能是游戏难易的平滑曲线做得不够好，如何让不同水平的玩家都能体会到游戏的乐趣，我想这也是游戏开发最难的一个环节。
最后加上点吐槽：回档是什么鬼啊，能不能正视这个问题，听说马上出新的dlc了，还是特意为中国玩家出的，我表示这有点像是圈钱了，讲真的，日常祭礼，卡钩子，板子竖在墙中间都什么鬼啊，咱能不能先把这些显而易见的bug修复修复，表面功夫首先要做好是吧，就像是卖水果，不管里面好不好，外面一定要擦亮，洗干净才会让人想买，新地图dlc我想想又是一堆bug，很心塞啊。
总的来说，还是一款很好的游戏。
Игра Класс
好玩，就是bug太多，匹配机制也有问题，老屠夫和新手或者半新手匹配在一起简直影响游戏体验，希望别一味地出Dlc，先管管bug和外挂吧。
有句话不得不说，杀鸡虐我千百遍，我待杀鸡如初恋.: D

For an asymmetrical horror game, it has awesome ideas. However, the execution is lacking and the developers seem nonresponsive. I gave this game a long time to get better, and it did a little. However camping is still has good incentives, which is a frustrating aspect of this game which will likely be its downfall. I hope this game gets better, but it is becoming a chore to play. Don't waste your time here yet, find a game with developers that listen to the community.

It is 2018 and the devs still have not addressed major problems with the game. Facecamping is still viable. Hatch standoffs are still a problem. Controls are glitchy in some cases. For example if you are standing on the hatch the game will sometimes use M1 to selfcare rather than jump in. The devs did do a good job revisiting some perks, but these changes should have been made a long time ago. Crutch perks such as selfcare, decisive strike, no one escapes death, and hex ruin still exist untouched, while exhaustion perks were needlessly nerfed into the ground. 

As of now I am still playing this game as the gameplay is addictive. Going from a deadly hide and seek to an adrenaline fueled chase is the only thing this game has to keep me around. I will still play, but I will not support this game until the devs start acting like they actually play this game and understand the mechanics as well as the average streamer. This game's major problems have been obvious for a long time, and these problems are the ones the developers never seem to look at. Instead they drop new killers and perks that further serve to create new balance issues. Great job of the fat asthmatic clown that is somehow also a track star and rpg alchemist. I know, for your next killer have it be a fisherman that can throw a hook that looks like a generator, and when a survivor tries to repair it they immediately get hooked in the basement on stage 2. Ya, that would be awesome. And make the fisherman's map an ocean, and he is the only one with a boat and the survivors have to swim. The pallets don't work because they are floating. Oh man, I could so work for these devs!
Amazing just Amazing

This Is A AMAZING Game So Scary And Tense As The Survivor And As The Killer Its Still Tense Because The Survivors Can Blind And Stun You And It Can Be Hard To Maintain A Chase Due To It Sp Its Scary And Tense Either Way And Also Riduculasly Fun!

Nuova patch 2.7.0 siamo a un punto di non ritorno, le mappe sono delle lande desolate,spesso capitano zone in cui in un raggio di 30 metri non c'è neanche un pallet. Consiglio comprate questo gioco solo se volete giocare da assassino. Se volete giocare da sopravvissuto evitate a meno che non avete una squadra fissa da 4 persone abbastanza forte.
Melhor jogo que a Steam lança faz MUITO tempo

I like this game alot and almost have 200 hours in it! They used to have issues with finding games with friends but they are doing work to fix it and me and my friends used to call this game "Dead by Loading" but not anymore!!! This game has an amazing concept and great survivor perks and Killers. This game requires skill and will improve your reaction time if you play survivor. You will be more keen to your surroundings by hearing and looking with killer. You also get to meet the community and truly, I think this is just a great game!!!

Edit: After 500+ hours in, as of today, they suck at fixing hitboxes, bugs, and they seem to make most games one sided, I would recommend if you like constant issues or if you like getting tunneled/camped/farmed by killers and useless teamates, game is fun but only with friends, otherwise its not as fun

Edit: Alright, 1000+ hours in. They are working their ass off and are actually listening to the community and making improvements to the game. This game is alot of fun and you dont get flamed as much any more and especially with people on console being in lobbies now. You will only get flamed if you are bad at the game and will only get tunneled/facecamped if you are either really good or if the killer is new. Still alot of fun but I still don't play it unless its with a friend because solo queue can be really painful queuing with a team with no coordination. 8/10 Still very fun to this day

Edit: almost 1500 hours of playtime, still alot of fun, MMR makes the experience more enjoyable most of the time and the game feels alot better on the survivor side but queues are back to being long, love the new content and I'm so glad Hawkins is gone, but there are a few maps that need work, overall still quite enjoyable.

Dear developers get the bug after exiting the game resets the rank, and the levels of pumping

Although the game had a slow start with lots of bugs etc most of it has been fixed.
i went into this game with not much confidence if it was gonna be any good, thank god was i surpised.
wether you like survivor or killer, both are fun to play.
the Devs although a bit slow at times keep the game up to date, a small but dedicated team.
I went into this without any friends to play with, and i'm still playing solo mostly, when i want to team up i hit the busy discord server and find some people :)

I recommend it.

+ points.
-Replayability
-Teaming with friends
-going solo is also fun, wether survivor or killer.
-Active Dev team with regular updates and fixes.
-achievement/goals, wether you want all the achievements or that one perk, the game gives you plenty a reason to start it up the next day.
-Doesn't bore as fast as a singleplayer RPG might.

- cons
-small dev team means updates and/or fixes may take a while.
-although alot of bugs has been fixed, you'll still encounter them every once in a while.
-community can be very toxic sometimes, from 'facecamping' killers, to 'pallet looping/teabagging' survivors.
-connection is peer to peer, so there is always the possibility of lag etc, DON'T BUY THIS GAME IF YOU HAVE A BAD INTERNET CONNECTION!!!! (You won't be able to enjoy the game as a survivor or a killer because of the peer to peer)


In general i really recommend it, i'm picking it up again after a couple of months and boy am i surprised at the amount of progress the game has made, makes me exciited to jump in again!

I hope the review has been helpfull!

See you guys in the fog! <3

EDIT: i'm going to Edit this review after a long time and alot of hours.
Whilst the game is still enjoyable i wish more then half of the community could still play.
A while back they updated the game to Unreal Engine 4, with it the Requirements for the game has gone up, which to me is no problem on its own as i SHOULD still be able to run it.
But as shown with any type of QOL change this has just caused more problems.
ALOT of people can't run this game anymore, and i myself whilst i still meet the requirements am forced to change/edit the Game files just to make it playable.. changing things that aren't presented as options ingame such as V-sync, unlocking the FPS cap granting me such a boost in FPS i'm wondering why they never bothered to allow people to chang these simple things themselves, i also noticed for some reason my screen size was so low it was creating input lag for absolutly no reason. (in files: 1020x1024 or smthing, whilst my screen is 1920x1080, changing it increased my fps by about 30)
Bugs known from the PTB are not patched out and still roll out with the update to live.
Although i absolutly love this game and i'd love to keep playing it, i'm risking blowing up my Pc if i don't change the game files, and i risk being banned because of it.
Devs response? there is none, oh yeah a new DLC with more bugs, no fixes and 0 optimization.
I think its a shame that i've felt the need to flag this game in the steam store, i think its a shame they're leaving their community in the dirt.
And i think its a shame i'm forced to now give this a negative review, not because its not a excellent and amazing game.
But because the Devs are a bunch of monkeys.

Cons:
Devs are destroying the game bit by bit, if you don't try to fix it yourself and risk being banned it might blow up your PC
Not kidding i've heard about crashes (i've experienced constant crashes)
i've heard about Forced Reboots because of overheating/overloading.
Heck i've even heard about a HDD having to repair itself because of this game which is insane.

At this point, i just wish the Devs would realise this is already so much out of their control that they sell it to a company willing to fix it.

Über die Jahre hinweg ist zu DbD eine kleine Hassliebe entstanden. Doch nun wurde es deinstalliert und wird erstmal für lange Zeit nicht mehr gespielt... Zur Zeit ist das Spiel wirklich keinesfalls zu empfehlen:

- Die Community hat wirklich stark nachgelassen
- Überhaupt kein Teamplay mehr
- Survivors die mit Killern spielen
- Killer die nur noch campen oder tunneln
- Mega schlechte Connections und langes Lobby suchen
- Bugs ohne Ende aber dafür jedes Quartal einen neuen Killer mit noch mehr Bugs
- Als Survivor überhaupt nicht mehr spielbar
- Killer sind OP - und das sage ich heute zum ersten mal ;) - aber die Range für ihre Attacken sind langsam einfach nur noch lächerlich...
more like a circus than a horror game

DbD ta em sua melhor fase, crescendo cada vez mais, cada vez mais evoluindo e ficando melhor ainda e cada vez mais divertido e com planos extremamente ambiciosos para o futuro do jogo, extremamente recomendado!

4vs1? Klingt im ersten Moment etwas schwer. Doch mit Teamplay und Koordination ist dies kein Problem.

EDIT: Dieses spiel ist mit dem Neuen Patch sowie Killer unspielbar. Bewegungsunschärfe ist mit reingekommen, welches sich nicht abschalten lässt.
Das Spiel ist einfach nur noch ein Helles teil.

EDIT 02.05.19: Das spiel ist einfach nur noch Tot. Immer mehr Camper und Tunnler die dich Flamen. Killer werden immer mehr gebuffed und der Surviver bleibt unverändert oder bekommt nervs... Das neue Ranking System ist das schlechteste was es gibt.. Warum gibts den mist überhaupt? Ich würde nach Stunden die Lobbys zusammenwerfen, aber da sie von GUTEN steam servern weg sind, wird das nie passieren. Hitbox wurde wahrscheinlich irgendwo in China gekauft. Die härte kommt noch. Statt das Game zu verbessern, kommen gefühlt alle 2 Wochen irg welche Skins die du dir für 10€ kaufen sollst...... Ingame shop ist aids... Braucht niemand...

EDIT 31.05.19
Nun haben wir das, was keiner will. Wir bekommen einen Killer, der fürs campen gemacht wurde. Was bekommen surviver? Nichts. Weniger palletten, keine infinites mehr... Nur noch camper---- 
Ich bereue es, über 1400 Stunden in dieses Spiel gesteckt zu haben.

EDIT 15.06.21
Die entwickler wollen nur noch euer Geld, tun nichts für surviver

We did a pretty good job so far

Es un juego con un potencial increible, la pega?, la comunidad tóxica de este juego , esta claro que los desarrolladores se les ve el plumero desde lejos, y es que sacan DLC's de aseisnos nuevos (Que obviamente es un pay to win en toda regla)
+ Ambientacion muy buena
+ Divertido (si juegas con amigos sobre todo)
+ cada X tiempo van sacando actualizaciones para "arreglar" algunos bugs, y cambios en la forma de juego
+ En teoria premian tus horas de juego con skins para los personajes
+ Aunque la finalidad en cada partida es la misma, he de decir que cada partida, cada jugador es un mundo, y a veces suceden cosas MUY epicas que hacen de este juego divertido.


- Como dije la comunidad es tóxica, asi que es probable que te encuentres un campero en toda regla siempre que juegues de survivor, y si juegas de killer,  aprenderas el significado del teabag y sus survivors vacilones que buscaran reirse de ti a cada momento
- No hay un equilibrio limpio entre killers y survivors, los desarrolladores en la mayoria de las ocasiones le dan la ventaja al killer en sus actualizaciones.
- El killer es quien hostea la partida, por tanto, si tiene un internet a pedales, preparate para sufrir lags y tirones varios.

재밌었고 재밌게했다 물론 게임성은 좋고 재밌다 그럼에도 비추누르는건 좆같은 떡볶이 핑 때문에 시간을 존나 버린다는거다. 웬만한 방 들어가면 노핑 빨핑이 대다수고 다인큐 잡으면 거의 빨핑방이다 여기서 버리는 시간만 모아도 게임 몇판은 더 돌리고  컴퓨터 껐을거다. 그리고 버그를 고치면 다른데서 버그가 또 생긴다 ㅋㅋ 누가 그러더라 땀억제 수술하면 다른곳에서 땀난다고 딱 그꼴이다 ㅋㅋ

Ahhh what do you say about a game where the devs are bad at it. Idk mabye never buy it. Because all they'll do is "balance" the game to make it easier for their main characters to be good, and in doing so ruin what could have been great. 最初は操作方法に戸惑うでしょう！そこをあきらめずに根気よく頑張れば必ず楽しくなれます！サーバーは海外（特にＵＳ）がおすすめです。日本鯖ですとマッチングしずらいです。もうベテラン勢がたくさんいますが、慣れれば、そのベテランをも何とか倒せますよ！ただ・・・ゲーム内のサバイバーの民度が低いので煽りやヤジコメントが多いので気にしてはいけません。これはあくまでもゲームなのですから、楽しみましょう！初心者サバイバーに一つアドバイス！走るのは見つかった時、キラーが遠くにいる時だけにしましょうね！初心者キラーさん（わたしもですが・・）煽るサバイバーは無視して、次の獲物に行きましょう！

I like this game, and some of the killers are decently balanced. One complaint is that "Nightmare" looks so much like a normal survior that I end up getting put in the Dream World and get injured or go into dying state. Also, the Hospital Map is so easy for the Killer, especially Shape and Wraith, as you never know when they'll be around a corner or not. Either way, I have changed my mind of the game and I enjoy it (1 part is because I got a brand new computer :3 )

Don't bother unless you're going to play as a survivor all the time! Game is heavily favourable for that character and when you do play as the killer you spend half your time running in circles and then getting called a camper and all names under the sun because you ensured your victim gets sacrificed!
Imagine a three way between Legends of the Hidden Temple, hide and seek, and horror tropes...the result is Dead By Daylight.
